ygData.subject: Re: Unrest
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the corrections, Didn t realize the gloves were off the magi. Doesn t the Hag have some kind of gloves? I recall our wizard looting and getting some
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the corrections, Didn't realize the gloves
were off the magi. Doesn't the Hag have some kind of
gloves? I recall our wizard looting and getting some
off a hag.

Belgarth Wolfstrider

--- Adrian Corey <doorman_sw@...> wrote:
> From: Adrian Corey <doorman_sw@...>
> >From: Doug Sorensen
> <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
> >Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> >To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> >Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Unrest
> >Date: Thu, 1 Jul 1999 10:54:39 -0700 (PDT)
> >
> >From: Doug Sorensen
> <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
> >
> >There are all kinds of good things in unrest.
>
> Bloodstained Mantle, Tunic and gloves. - Undead
> knight(Gloves are from the
> Ghoul Magi and are leather based NOT chain as the
> other 2 peices are)
>
> Savant's Cap or Dusty Blood stained Gloves - ghoul
> magi
> >Leather Apron (high AC belt) - undead barkeep
> Dwarven Work Boots - not sure, in the basement
> (Comes from the Dwarvin Ghost
> also has Jagged Bands ac 5 + 5 str rings)
>
> Ivory bracer? - animated hand(Ivory Bracelet not
> bracer)
> Tentacle whips - tentacle terrors(which are close to
> the dwarvin spirit)
> >Fine Steel weapons for selling - skels above dry
> and
> >carrion ghouls IIRC
> >Small bronze plate - dry bone skeletons
> >
> >that's a quick list off the top of my head.
> >
> >Belgarth Wolfstrider
